text: Magar jo shaks Rasool ki mukhalifat par qamar basta ho aur ehle iman ki rawish ke siwa kisi aur rawish par chaley, daraan haal yeh ke uspar raah e raast wazeh ho chuki ho, to usko hum usi taraf chalayenge jidhar woh khud phir gaya aur usey jahannum mein jhonkenge jo badhtareen jaye qarar (evil destination) hai
